EmailTemplate.name: MMScriptClientRejectionNotification
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Script {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.Name} is rejected by Client
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.OwnerFirstName},
The script {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.Name} is rejected by Client. You need to rework on the script and resend the script for approval.
Sincerely, ADvendio Team
